summary: This is a tweak for numenume's elf ears so they only apply to elves (female).
descriptionHtml:
This mod is based on the replacer version of numenume's elf ear mod (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13173). All credit to him since I consider redoing the models much more difficult than the .esp I made.

This only works for the player character for some reason. (I have no plans to fix it for the time being)

***You must uninstall the numenume files or they will still be applied***

I made this since, at least for me, the elf ears were being applied to females of all races and I only wanted elfs to have it. This has worked as intend for me and my one tester.

I used the "sono5 female5" head model. You can easily change this by placing the femalehead.nif for the head model you desire in "data/meshes/actors/character/Elf Ears" folder (after this mod is installed).

This mod is compatible with Ethereal Elvan Overhaul.

As far as I know this won't work for custom races unless you edit the ElfEars.esp, since I'm using default classes. The edit is pretty simple since all you need to do is associate the .nif to your custom race as a headpart.

Hurricane Winds and Seas from the beam,
-SeaFaringGentleman
author: SeaFaringGentleman
